Magazine as a plant container: Use the pages as a plant container for small plants or herbs. The paper is biodegradable and can be easily watered through the bottom of the container.
Magazine as a bird feeder: Fold the magazine into a cone shape and hang it outside. Use peanut butter and birdseed to attract birds to the feeder.
Magazine as a portable phone stand: Fold the magazine in half and use it as a portable phone stand. The pages can be used to prop up the phone at a comfortable angle.
Magazine as a bookmark: Use the pages as a bookmark in your favorite book. The paper is lightweight and won't damage the book.
Magazine as a candle holder: Cut out a circular hole in the middle of the magazine and use it as a candle holder. The paper is lightweight and won't melt.
